title: The Ultimate Icebreaker
description: 60 fun questions and challenges to get the party started. Perfect for new groups, office parties, or hanging out.

cards.content: Truth: What is the weirdest food combination you actually enjoy?
cards.back: Dare: Eat a spoonful of a condiment (ketchup, mustard, etc.) on its own.

cards.content: Truth: What is the most embarrassing thing you've done in a Zoom meeting?
cards.back: Dare: Pretend your screen froze and hold a weird face for 20 seconds.

cards.content: Truth: If you could swap lives with anyone in this room, who would it be?
cards.back: Dare: Do your best impression of the person to your left.

cards.content: Truth: What is a song you love but are embarrassed to admit?
cards.back: Dare: Hum a song and keep humming until someone guesses it.

cards.content: Truth: When was the last time you lied to get out of plans?
cards.back: Dare: Text the last person you messaged saying 'I know your secret.'

cards.content: Truth: Do you believe in ghosts or aliens?
cards.back: Dare: Act like an alien trying to communicate with humans for 30 seconds.

cards.content: Truth: What is the worst haircut you've ever had?
cards.back: Dare: Let the group style your hair however they want for the next round.

cards.content: Truth: Who was your first celebrity crush?
cards.back: Dare: Act out a romantic scene with an invisible partner.

cards.content: Truth: What is the last thing you Googled?
cards.back: Dare: Show your browser history from today to the group.

cards.content: Truth: Have you ever practiced an award acceptance speech in the mirror?
cards.back: Dare: Give a 1-minute speech about how much you love socks.

cards.content: Truth: What is one thing you are irrationally afraid of?
cards.back: Dare: Act out your worst fear using only mime (no talking).

cards.content: Truth: What is the longest you’ve gone without showering?
cards.back: Dare: Let someone draw a fake tattoo on your arm with a pen.

cards.content: Truth: If you were a superhero, what would your lame power be?
cards.back: Dare: Strike a superhero pose and hold it for one minute.

cards.content: Truth: Have you ever stalked an ex on social media accidentally?
cards.back: Dare: Like the first photo on your Instagram feed, no matter what it is.

cards.content: Truth: What is the strangest gift you have ever received?
cards.back: Dare: Wrap yourself in toilet paper like a mummy.

cards.content: Truth: What is your biggest pet peeve?
cards.back: Dare: Let everyone in the group flick your forehead once.

cards.content: Truth: Do you talk to yourself when you are alone?
cards.back: Dare: Have a full argument with a chair.

cards.content: Truth: What is the worst job you've ever had?
cards.back: Dare: Pretend to be a waiter and take everyone's drink order formally.

cards.content: Truth: Have you ever peed in a pool?
cards.back: Dare: Drink a glass of water without using your hands.

cards.content: Truth: What is your go-to karaoke song?
cards.back: Dare: Belt out the chorus of 'Let It Go' or a Whitney Houston song.

cards.content: Truth: Have you ever walked into a glass door?
cards.back: Dare: Walk across the room like a supermodel on a runway.

cards.content: Truth: What is the grossest thing you’ve ever touched?
cards.back: Dare: Let the group concoct a 'mystery drink' (non-toxic) for you to sip.

cards.content: Truth: Who is your favorite person in this room?
cards.back: Dare: Give the person to your right a compliment.

cards.content: Truth: What is the most expensive thing you’ve broken?
cards.back: Dare: Do 10 jumping jacks while singing the alphabet.

cards.content: Truth: Do you sleep with a stuffed animal?
cards.back: Dare: Curled up in a ball and pretend to be a sleeping cat.

cards.content: Truth: What’s the silliest reason you’ve cried?
cards.back: Dare: Make a crying face but laugh at the same time.

cards.content: Truth: Have you ever been caught picking your nose?
cards.back: Dare: Put your finger in your ear and keep it there for the next turn.

cards.content: Truth: What is a movie you pretended to like just to seem cool?
cards.back: Dare: Re-enact the famous 'I'm flying' scene from Titanic alone.

cards.content: Truth: Have you ever re-gifted a present?
cards.back: Dare: Try to sell a random object in the room like a TV infomercial host.

cards.content: Truth: What is your most useless talent?
cards.back: Dare: Try to touch your nose with your tongue.

cards.content: Truth: Have you ever cheated on a test?
cards.back: Dare: Speak in rhymes for the next 3 rounds.

cards.content: Truth: What is your favorite smell?
cards.back: Dare: Go around and smell everyone's shoe.

cards.content: Truth: Have you ever dropped your phone in the toilet?
cards.back: Dare: Balance your phone on your head and walk across the room.

cards.content: Truth: What is the most childish thing you still do?
cards.back: Dare: Speak in a baby voice for the next minute.

cards.content: Truth: Have you ever faked being sick to miss work/school?
cards.back: Dare: Do your best fake cough and sneeze performance.

cards.content: Truth: What is your hidden talent?
cards.back: Dare: Perform a magic trick (even if it's terrible).

cards.content: Truth: Who in this room would die first in a horror movie?
cards.back: Dare: Let out your most terrifying scream.

cards.content: Truth: Have you ever sent a text to the wrong person?
cards.back: Dare: Send a gif to the 5th person in your contact list.

cards.content: Truth: What is the worst fashion trend you participated in?
cards.back: Dare: Wear your socks on your hands for the next round.

cards.content: Truth: Do you snore?
cards.back: Dare: Pretend to be a chainsaw for 15 seconds.

cards.content: Truth: What is your dream job?
cards.back: Dare: Mime your dream job until someone guesses it.

cards.content: Truth: Have you ever been kicked out of somewhere?
cards.back: Dare: Stand in the corner and think about what you've done.

cards.content: Truth: What is your favorite vegetable?
cards.back: Dare: Open the fridge and talk to the vegetables.

cards.content: Truth: Have you ever had a paranormal experience?
cards.back: Dare: Tell a ghost story in a spooky voice.

cards.content: Truth: What is the worst advice you’ve ever given?
cards.back: Dare: Give someone terrible advice about their hair right now.

cards.content: Truth: Have you ever laughed so hard you peed?
cards.back: Dare: Don't blink for 30 seconds.

cards.content: Truth: What is your biggest regret from high school?
cards.back: Dare: Do the Chicken Dance for 30 seconds.

cards.content: Truth: Have you ever eaten food out of the trash?
cards.back: Dare: Pretend to be a dog and beg for a treat.

cards.content: Truth: What is the most boring movie you’ve ever watched?
cards.back: Dare: Yawn loudly every time someone speaks for the next minute.

cards.content: Truth: Have you ever forgotten someone's name immediately after meeting them?
cards.back: Dare: Introduce yourself to everyone in the room again.

cards.content: Truth: What is the last thing you purchased?
cards.back: Dare: Try to juggle 3 items of the group's choice.

cards.content: Truth: Do you check yourself out in store windows?
cards.back: Dare: Do your best runway walk and pose.

cards.content: Truth: What is your favorite swear word?
cards.back: Dare: Replace that swear word with 'Fluffernutter' in a sentence.

cards.content: Truth: Have you ever accidentally insulted someone?
cards.back: Dare: Bow to every person in the room.

cards.content: Truth: What is the longest time you've spent scrolling on TikTok/Reels?
cards.back: Dare: Recreate a viral dance trend (badly).

cards.content: Truth: Do you believe in astrology?
cards.back: Dare: Interpret the future of the person to your left by looking at their palm.

cards.content: Truth: Have you ever been to a nude beach?
cards.back: Dare: Put an ice cube down your back.

cards.content: Truth: What is the messiest room in your house?
cards.back: Dare: Organize the shoes of everyone in the room by size.

cards.content: Truth: Have you ever kissed a mirror?
cards.back: Dare: Kiss your hand and slap it on your forehead.

cards.content: Truth: What is your favorite emoji?
cards.back: Dare: Make the face of your favorite emoji until your next turn.
